aiGuidance.purpose: Single source of truth for design tokens + component class recipes. Use this to generate UIs that look consistent and feel intentional (modern minimal / soft neutral, comfortable density).

constraints.format: This file must remain valid JSON (no comments). Put guidance in string fields like aiGuidance.*.
constraints.tokenUsage: Prefer semantic tokens (bg-app, bg-surface, border-border, text-text-*) over raw hex values in UI code.

tailwindNamingRules.nestedColors: Nested color keys generate utilities like text-text-secondary (NOT text-secondary). Example: colors.text.secondary => class 'text-text-secondary'.
tailwindNamingRules.brand: Use 'bg-brand' for brand fills. Brand is near-black; reserve for emphasis and current/active states.
tailwindNamingRules.semantic: Use semantic colors sparingly for status: success/warning/error/info.

layoutRules.density: Comfortable spacing. Use gaps/padding from spacingScale intent (e.g. gap-6, p-6) rather than tight dense layouts.
layoutRules.containers: Follow layout.containers recipes when building page scaffolding. If building a single-page showcase, render sections inside AppShell or a centered container with bg-app.

componentRules.composition: Treat component entries as class recipes. Keep variants small and predictable; do not invent new variants without adding them here.
componentRules.interaction: Apply hover/focus/active patterns from interaction.* consistently across interactive components.

accessibility.focusVisible: Always include focus-visible rings per interaction.focusVisible.tailwind.
accessibility.labels: Inputs must have accessible labels. If hidden, use sr-only + placeholder per components.Input.labelPattern.

contentGuidelines.voice: Neutral, clear, professional. Avoid overly playful colors or gradients.
contentGuidelines.examples: When generating demo content, keep it CRM/productivity themed (leads, tasks, activity, pipeline, history).

authPatterns.loginLayout: Centered card on bg-app. No heavy branding; clean, functional, comfortable spacing.
authPatterns.formFlow: Vertical stack with consistent gap-4 or gap-6. Labels above inputs. Primary button spans full width.
authPatterns.errorHandling: Use semantic-error color with subtle bg tint (bg-semantic-error/5) and border.
authPatterns.forgotPassword: Text link below form, ghost button style or simple text-text-muted with hover:text-text-primary.

validationChecklist: JSON parses (no smart quotes, no trailing commas).
All classes reference existing Tailwind tokens (e.g., text-text-secondary, not text-secondary).
